subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Instead of going after 44-year-old Roger Clemens, the Yankees should take a lesson from Mets General Manager Omar Minaya and seek out relatively obscure pitchers on their way up.
snippet: Instead of going after 44-year-old Roger Clemens, the Yankees should take a lesson from Mets General Manager Omar Minaya and seek out relatively obscure pitchers on their way up.
